data.name: Man O' War: Corsair - Reik's Fashion
data.detailed_description:
Dress in the height of Reik's fashion: includes a swish and not too rotten Shark hat, the Helm of the Skaven Slayer and more!

(Note: This DLC was free for everyone purchasing Man O' War: Corsair during Early Access and its first week of full release.)

To activate: This DLC grants a new outfit and several hats to all your human captains whether creating a new game or loading an old save. From the map screen go to the Captain menu and then Outfit to wear your new clothing.

fullgame.name: Man O' War: Corsair - Warhammer Naval Battles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800 GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.5Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.3Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 6200
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS or Ubuntu 14.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170T
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 850M 2GB
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.5Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970
